Posts.Content: May 24, 2018 11:57AM Widmt wrote: Bad mammo on 5-18. Diagnostic mammo an Us on both breasts (wasn’t expecting that) this past Tuesday. 0.8 spicuolated with microcalicications in right, 2.7 spicuolated mass, deep, in left. I do have fibrocystic disease, 3 maternal aunts with breast cancer, no kids at 46, and PCOS. Bi Rads score 4, biopsies under ultrasound this Tuesday. I’m freaking out. Both sides. Lord, have mercy.
Posts.Title: Spiculated Mass joanmac52 Moderators
